cards.dialogue: Hindustan zindabad tha, zindabad hai, zindabad rahega.
Hum dost the, hain aur rahenge.
Kaun kambakht bardaasht karne ko peeta hai; main toh peeta hoon ke bas saans le saku.
Keh diya na… bas keh diya.
Main aayega.
Utha le re baba… mujhe nahi, in dono ko utha le.
Tumhare paas kya hai? Sirf ek chance.
Agar tumhara dard tumhe nazar nahi aata, toh tum andhe ho.
Mujhe states ke naam nahi sunai dete, sirf ek mulk ka naam sunai deta hai.
Sattar minute… sirf sattar minute hain tumhare paas.
Har bachcha special hota hai.
Sikhni hoon main Bhatinda ki!
Koi bhi desh perfect nahi hota, usse perfect banana padta hai.
Ek baar jo maine commitment kar di, uske baad main khud ki bhi nahi sunta.
Thappad se darr nahi lagta saab, pyaar se lagta hai.
All is well.
Bachcha hai ji… dil toh bachcha hai ji.
Main ek aam aadmi hoon.
Tum log business karte ho; main business banata hoon.
Tum logon ko ek saal mein paise double chahiye… 25 din mein paisa double.
Jiske saath vyapaar karo, usse kabhi pyaar nahi karna.
Beta, tumse na ho payega.
Sher ko maarne ke liye shikari nahi, dusra sher chahiye.
cards.answer: Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai

cards.dialogue: Tumhara ishq ishq, hamara ishq kaam.
Kabhi kabhi jeetne ke liye kuch haarna padta hai… aur haar kar jeetne wale ko baazigar kehte hain.
cards.hint: TV playing old clip in room

cards.dialogue: Mujhe nafrat hai jhoot se.
Tumhare bina meri zindagi mein kuch nahi.
Aye Ganpat, chal daaru la!
Bachpan se hi na, mujhe shaadi se darr lagta hai.
Aap convinced hain? Ya main aur bolun?
Darr ke aage jeet hai.
cards.answer: Darr Ke Aage Jeet Hai (film usage in 2000s ad cameo)

cards.dialogue: Aap purush nahi, mahapurush ho… par galat ho.
Mujhe tumse kuch kehna hai… par kaise kahun?
Bhai ne bola karne ka, matlab karne ka.
Insaan ka sabse bada rog, kya kahenge log.
Zindagi mein kuch banna ho, kuch hasil karna ho, toh hamesha dil ki suno.
Ab jo bhi ho, sach bolna.
Aap puri izzat se wapas aayenge.
Bandook se nikalne wali goli na Muslim hoti hai na Hindu.
Aaj tumhari hansi ne jeetna sikha diya.
Mujhe apni pehchan chahiye.
Pyaar mein kabhi kabhi sab kuch sahi nahi hota.
Itna sannata kyun hai bhai?
Dusri baar mauka mile na mile.
Padhai likhai sab theek, par insaaniyat sabse badi cheez hai.
Mere paas yeh ek mauka hai, bas.
cards.answer: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year

cards.dialogue: Jab tak hum khud khud par bharosa nahi karte, koi aur nahi karega.
Yeh shehar bikharta nahi, bas badalta rehta hai.
Tumse milke laga tum wohi ho jiska intezaar tha.
Dosti ka ek usool hai madam— no sorry, no thank you.
Bade logon ki zindagi bade faislon se nahi, chhoti khushiyon se banti hai.
Tujhe yaad kar liya hai aayaat ki tarah.
Yeh sab system ka khel hai.
Mard ko dard hota hai, par woh chhupata hai.
Hum aapke hain kaun? Bas ek mehmaan.
Main udna chahta hoon, daudna chahta hoon, girna bhi chahta hoon.
Badle ki aag mein jaloge toh khud hi raakh ho jaoge.
Jo bhi hoon, apni mehnat se hoon.
Jahanpanah tussi great ho… darwaza band kardo.
Bholenath ke bharose pe duniya chalti hai.
Aadat hai mujhe seedha bolne ki.
Mujhe voting se nahi, sach se lagav hai.
Dil ki baat bolne se pehle dimag se kaam lo.
Bachche mann se sachche hote hain.
Yeh dosti bhi na, kabhi kabhi bojh ban jaati hai.
Bandook uthane se pehle sochna padta hai.
cards.answer: Haider (carry-over vibe echoed earlier decade scene)

cards.dialogue: Apni aukaat se zyada sapne mat dekho.
Aap plot chhod dijiye, baaki hum dekh lenge.
Naukri chhoti ya badi nahi hoti, soch badi honi chahiye.
cards.answer: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year

cards.dialogue: Agar tum theek ho, toh duniya theek lagti hai.
Bhai, planning badi strong honi chahiye.
Zindagi bahut lambi hai, par tum ho ki samajhte nahi.
Main kisi ki zarurat nahi, pasand banna chahta hoon.
Mujhe apni dosti pe poora bharosa hai.
Insaan sirf sapne dekh kar nahi jeeta.
Bacchon par haath uthane wale ki ungli tod doonga.
Waqt se pehle aur kismat se zyada kabhi kisi ko nahi milta.
cards.answer: Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya? (proverb used earnestly)

cards.dialogue: Yeh shehar main chalaata hoon.
cards.answer: Gangs of Wasseypur (carry-over line used as reference)

cards.dialogue: Pyaar ek baar hota hai, repeat mat karo.
Akal badi ya bhains?
Maine tumhe choose kiya hai, duniya ko nahi.
Yeh kahani hum sab ki hai.
Raaste wahi bante hain jahan kadam padte hain.
Dhandha hai par ganda nahi.
cards.answer: Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai

cards.dialogue: Main sirf tumhara saathi nahi, imtihaan bhi hoon.
Himmat ek aadat hoti hai.
Aadmi ko apni aukaat nahi bhoolni chahiye.
Yeh duniya gol hai; milenge phir kahin.
Jo cheez toot jaaye, usse jodna mushkil hota hai.
Jisme dum hai woh saamne aata hai.
Life ka sabse bada fundaa— jo hota hai, acche ke liye hota hai.
Jo dikhte ho woh ho nahi, jo ho woh dikhte nahi.
Maine tumhe kabhi roka? Tumhe khulke jeena chahiye.
Agar tumhara dil saaf hai, toh rasta khud banega.
Aaj khush to bahut hoge tum… par yaad rakhna, daam dena padega.
Kuch kar guzarna hai, sirf jeena nahi.
Aisa mauka baar baar nahi aata.
Mujhe tumhari muskurahat se mohabbat hai.
Jinke ghar sheeshe ke hote hain, woh dusron pe pathar nahi phenka karte.
Main tumhe bhoolne ki koshish karta hoon, par tum bhoolti nahi.
